Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Doesn't work well with Multiple Spouses mod, since it changes every romance dialogue

Entries.spring_Mon10: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I have always wanted to be a mother.$3#$b#Would it be presumptuous of me to ask how you feel about children?$1#$e#Perhaps we could...$7#$b#Well.$3#$b#Never mind.$4
Entries.winter_Sat6: I am refreshed today, and I've come to terms with my feelings. I may not be a mother to her, but I can still be a good person.$9#$b#I hope you forgive my oddness of late, @. You have seen me in a moment of weakness.$4#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Fri10: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.#7#$b#Magus. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$1#$b#Or should I try mundane?$3#$b#Mark?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Wizard'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$1

Entries.OneKid_0: {{Random: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I had always wanted to be a mother. At long last, I can see this wish come true.$1#$e#Just one more thing you have granted me.$7 @@ Have you seen %kid1, recently?$3#$e#What? No. Of course I didn't lose our child$11#$b#Everything is under control.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_0: {{Random: When I said I wished to be a mother, I do not think I fully understood the implications.$3#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before he moved on to do good unto the world.$3#$e#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.$1 @@ Do you ever stand here and marvel at the two beautiful children our love has brought into the world?$9#$e#I do every day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_2: {{Random: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet...#$b#and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.$2#$e#Is this what it means to be a mother?$3 @@ We're blessed that %kid1 and %kid2 have your features$7.#$e#It wouldn't feel right for any child to look like this old witch.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Twokids_3: {{Random: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.$3#$e#A mother, I hope. And nothing less.$1 @@ This life... with you and our children...$4#$b#It's more than I ever thought I would have.$1#$e#Thank you, @, for choosing me.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_4: My name is...I still don't remember.#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.$1#$b#Magus. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$1#$b#Or should I try mundane?$3#$b#Mark?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Witch'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$7

Entries.1: Location/Meet The Witch/You received a letter from the local witch. She claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the witch's tower./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The Witch asked me to retrieve the magic ink from her ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The Witch wants you to descend into the mines and fetch her a Void Essence. She needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring Rasmodia a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You have earned my gratitude. Please, take this in return. Coin means little to me.$1
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The Witch is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. She needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring Rasmodia an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my eternal thanks.$1

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: Much as I am eager to be a mother, I cannot help but be apprehensive about the changes a child will bring to our lives...$2#$e#Swear to me that whatever comes, we will make the changes for the better.$1

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13546: I require {0} for potion-making. Please deliver directly to my study.     -M. Rasmodia, Witch
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13548: The Witch, M. Rasmodia, wishes to study the arcane properties of the {0}. You will be rewarded.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13553: Local witch is in search of a fresh {0}.
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing the elemental balance into disarray. I would like an adventurer to enter the mines and slay {1} of these {2}.  -M. Rasmodia, Witch

Entries.Spouseroom.15: You're positive these candles have been burning ever since she moved in. They never seem to get any smaller.

Entries.wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with me. With you nearby I slept soundly as I have not for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ M. Rasmodia
Entries.teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ M. Rasmodia

Entries.MagicInkDescription: You've found the Witch's lost {0}! Better return it to her.
